name: indeed_bulk_search
description: Search multiple job queries on Indeed in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling indeed_search_jobs multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'software engineer,data analyst,product manager'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated job search queries (e.g. 'frontend developer,backend engineer,devops')

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Optional location filter applied to all searches (e.g. 'Remote', 'New York, NY')

steps.code: const location = '{{location}}'; const locParam = (location && location !== '{{' + 'location}}' && location.trim()) ? '&l=' + encodeURIComponent(location.trim()) : ''; return `{{queries}}`.split(',').map(q => ({ url: 'https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=' + encodeURIComponent(q.trim()) + locParam, query: q.trim() }))
steps.name: items
steps.label: Build search URL list

detailSteps.code: const jobs = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.job_seen_beacon, .jobsearch-SerpJobCard, div.cardOutline, .resultContent'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 10); i++) { const card = cards[i]; const titleEl = card.querySelector('h2.jobTitle a, h2.jobTitle span, a.jcs-JobTitle span'); const companyEl = card.querySelector('[data-testid="company-name"], .companyName, span.css-1h7lukg'); const locationEl = card.querySelector('[data-testid="text-location"], .companyLocation'); const salaryEl = card.querySelector('.salary-snippet-container, .salaryOnly, [data-testid="attribute_snippet_testid"]'); const linkEl = card.querySelector('h2.jobTitle a, a.jcs-JobTitle'); jobs.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', company: companyEl ? companyEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', salary: salaryEl ? salaryEl.textContent.trim() : 'Not listed', url: linkEl ? 'https://www.indeed.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href') : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', job_count: jobs.length, jobs: jobs }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract job listings
